articles.author: Jess Weatherbed
articles.title: European iPad users can soon download apps from third-party stores - The Verge
articles.description: Apple will let iPad users in the European Union download apps from alternative app marketplaces starting on September 16th, coinciding with the release of iPadOS 18.
articles.content:
European iPad users can soon download apps from third-party stores
